text: Barry Whitley Sinclair (23 October 1936 - 11 July 2022) was a New Zealand cricketer. He played for the New Zealand cricket team in 21 Test matches from 1963 to 1968. Sinclair also played for Wellington cricket team between 1955 to 1971. He was born in Wellington, New Zealand. Sinclair died on 11 July 2022 in Wellington, aged 85.Cricket: Former New Zealand test captain Barry Sinclair dies aged 85 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Wellington
title: Barry Sinclair
